title: NAB SHOW LAS VEGAS LAUNCH
message: An event that allowed strategic agreements that served to promote, even more, the transformation process that the Broadcast Industry is going through.

title: OHMIO BOX DEVELOPMENT
message: We created a mechanism using the IoT to measure the transmissions, storing the information in real time from the stations.

title: DAPP DEVELOPMENT
message: During this stage we implement a decentralized application that allows us to store information in the ohm box, generate rewards and buy and sell crypto assets.

title: OHMIO COIN RELEASE TEST
message: During this stage we have developed a token to generate payments in the broadcast industry. Ensuring international interoperability, to maintain the liquidity of each group in the specific places required. All through a fast, transparent and secure registration.

title: OHMIO WALLET
message: We are working to give users the best experience with our wallet.
